item.title: CVE-2024-33537|2024-04-29T05:26:29.201Z -- Theme Horse -- WP Portfolio
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in Theme Horse WP Portfolio allows Stored XSS.This issue affects WP Portfolio: from n/a through 2.4.
